(@) Whore, prior to the date of the commencement of this Act, any permit under the principal enactment has been signed or endorsed by any officer, other than an officer appointed under sub-section (1) of section 6, such permit shall, at all times, be deemed to be and to have been as valid and effectual as if it had been signed or endorsed by the Government Agent.
